title: Simulation-Based Advanced Training for Integrating Human Resource Management and Informal Workplace Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Organizational behavior theory, basic human resource management, and adult learning theories
context.additional_context: Recreates real organizational environments through learner role-playing and VR simulations, utilizing collaboration tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Analyze and apply eight HRM strategies to enhance organizational members' affective commitment in a simulated environment.
Propose a design plan for an organizational support system (based on Organizational Support Theory) to promote informal learning through VR scenario-based team projects.
Implement a mathematical modeling process for building workplace learning communities by applying Lave & Wenger's Situated Learning Theory.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
